item.title: Lock or remove please no longer needed
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:6, topic:125196”][quote author=Lin link=topic=175404.msg1617516#msg1617516 date=1185007347]

planet renders lol i through the sprites together and make animations

Show us how to make this animation of yours, the last time I was here you graphical abilities where very, very limited. Then your showing me fully animated sprites? I need to see proof you made them.
[/quote]He was talking to me on msn when he was making them, showing me his progress, and explaining everything he did.

So he showed you? Goody, now show the rest of us?[/quote]

Its not the hardest thing to get sprites and change them each frame…

Read full topic
